name: Overall Comparison
query: SELECT r.agent_id AS "Model", COUNT(*) AS "Tasks", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.detection) * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.diagnosis) * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.recovery) * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.total), 1) AS "Avg Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.agent_id ORDER BY "Avg Total" DESC

name: All Results
query: SELECT r.agent_id AS "Model", r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS t(r) WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC
